topic.title: 주택담보대출 신청 상담
topic.description: 주택담보대출 신청 절차와 자격 요건에 대해 상담하는 기초 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 주택담보대출 신청에 대해 문의하고 싶습니다.
네, 오세요. 어떤 종류의 대출을 찾고 계신가요?
좋습니다. 일반적인 주택담보대출에 대해 설명해 드릴게요.
신용 점수, 소득, 그리고 선납금이 중요합니다.
추가 정보는 어디서 얻을 수 있나요?
저희 웹사이트를 방문하시거나, 제가 안내해 드릴게요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I would like to inquire about applying for a mortgage.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I would like to inquire about applying for a mortgage.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, please come in. What kind of loan are you looking for?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, please come in. | What kind of loan are you looking for?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I am looking to buy a home for the first time.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I am looking to buy a home for the first time.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Great. I can explain about a standard mortgage loan.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Great. | I can explain about a standard mortgage loan.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Credit score, income, and down payment are important.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Credit score, income, and down payment are important.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Where can I get more information?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Where can I get more information?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: You can visit our website, or I can guide you.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: You can visit our website, | or I can guide you.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: "Hello, I would like to inquire about applying for a mortgage."
"Yes, please come in. What kind of loan are you looking for?"
"I am looking to buy a home for the first time."
"Great. I can explain about a standard mortgage loan."
"What are the eligibility requirements?"
"Credit score, income, and down payment are important."
"Where can I get more information?"
"You can visit our website, or I can guide you."

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 추가 정보는 어디서 얻을 수 있나요?
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: Where can I get more information?
highlight_sentences.reason: 이 문장은 사용자가 대출 절차에 대한 추가 정보를 얻으려는 적극적인 단계를 나타내므로 중요합니다.
